column5: I'm going camping this weekend with a friends and i need to know a good lake that has camping and and fishing from boat ... in the range of 2 hours maybe 2 1/2 from K-W area ... i don't feel like taking the long trip to algonquin anyone have any better ideas?for fishing i would like bass,pike,walleye but thats mostly anywhere in ontario - Thanks!
Well being it the long weekend, any camping which requires site reservation worth going to is likely booked within that radius.  I would probably look at map of crown land and go from there.
